document.full_text: roger federer lost to jurgen melzer 6-4, 6-4 in swirling wind in the monte carlo masters quarterfinals friday, his earliest tournament exit since wimbledon last year.
document.title: federer loses to melzer at monte carlo masters
lines_and_colors: roger federer lost to jurgen melzer 6-4, 6-4 in swirling wind in the monte carlo masters quarterfinals friday, his earliest tournament exit since wimbledon last year.
